oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Suspension aus Biogasanlagen: Qualität und Wirkung auf den Ertrag
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Raubuch, Markus
Terhoeven-Urselmans, Thomas
Scheller, Edwin
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nutrient turnover
Composting and manuring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In the present study we looked on the impact of biogas suspension from the Demeter-farm ‘Gut Sambach’ near Muehlhausen on the microbial and mineral nitrogen pool in fallow and the impact on yield of barley. We could demonstrate the composition of amino acids was not affected by the fermentation process. The applied amount of nitrogen was 65.7 kg Nt ha-1 whereby the proportion of ammonium was 24 % (15.8 kg N ha-1). The yield of barley was significantly increased.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Raubuch, Markus; Terhoeven-Urselmans, Thomas and Scheller, Edwin (2005) Suspension aus Biogasanlagen: Qualität und Wirkung auf den Ertrag. [Biogas suspension: quality and effect on yield.] In: Heß, J and Rahmann, G (Eds.) Ende der Nische, Beiträge zur 8. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, kassel university press GmbH, Kassel.
